## Data Camp

Please complete the **Factor Analysis in R** course on [Data Camp](https://www.datacamp.com/){target="_blank"}. The module covers:

- Evaluating your measure with factor analysis
- Multidimensional EFA
- Confirmatory Factor Analysis
- Refining your measure and/or model Interpreting regression models
